images.copyright: Jiaxiu Tower under a full moon, Guiyang, Guizhou province, China (© Wang Yukun/Getty Images)
images.title: Under the full moon's gaze
images.caption: Mid-Autumn Festival
images.desc: As summer's warmth gently yields to autumn's cool embrace, the Mid-Autumn Festival lights up the Chinese city of Guiyang, celebrating the full moon and the autumn harvest. Also known as the Moon Festival, it takes place on the 15th day of the year's eighth lunar month in the Chinese calendar.

tooltips.walle: This image is not available to download as wallpaper.
